data: `minecraft:transformation` defines an entity's transformation from the current definition into another.

data.Name: add
data.Description: List of components to add to the entity after the transformation

data.Name: begin_transform_sound
data.Description: Sound to play when the transformation starts

data.Name: drop_equipment
data.Description: Cause the entity to drop all equipment upon transformation

data.Name: drop_inventory
data.Description: Cause the entity to drop all items in inventory upon transformation

data.Name: into
data: Entity Definition that this entity will transform into.

data.Name: keep_level
data.Description: If this entity has trades and has leveled up, it should maintain that level after transformation.
data: Entity Definition that this entity will transform into.

data.Name: keep_owner
data.Description: If this entity is owned by another entity, it should remain owned after transformation.
data: Entity Definition that this entity will transform into.

data.Name: preserve_equipment
data.Description: Cause the entity to keep equipment after going through transformation
data: Entity Definition that this entity will transform into.

data.Name: transformation_sound
data.Description: Sound to play when the entity is done transforming
data: Entity Definition that this entity will transform into.

data.Name: delay
data.Description: Defines the properties of the delay for the transformation
data: Entity Definition that this entity will transform into.
`add` is a JSON Object defined by ten parameters. Each item has the following properties:

data.Name: component_groups
data.Description: Names of component groups to add

data: `delay` is a JSON Object defined by six parameters. Each item has the following properties:

data.Name: block_assist_chance
data.Description: Chance that the entity will look for nearby blocks that can speed up the transformation. Value must be between 0.0 and 1.0

data.Name: block_chance
data.Description: Chance that, once a block is found, will help speed up the transformation

data.Name: block_max
data.Description: Maximum number of blocks the entity will look for to aid in the transformation. If not defined or set to 0, it will be set to the block radius

data.Name: block_radius
data.Description: Distance in Blocks that the entity will search for blocks that can help the transformation

data.Name: block_types
data.Description: List of blocks that can help the transformation of this entity

data.Name: value
data.Description: Time in seconds before the entity transforms
